Subject:
Build Event-Driven Agentic Document Workflows in this new free
 course!

Dear learner,

Since you’ve taken one of our Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) courses, you already know how powerful RAG is for answering questions based on document data. But what if you could take it further—structuring AI workflows that automate entire document processes?

In our new short course, Event-Driven Agentic Document Workflows (https://info.deeplearning.ai/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJhC404/VXhDVq6L5f-mW4_ms5s90T7ltW3S9mTt5sPp46N74Pqvv3prCCW95jsWP6lZ3nNW6BZvXr4xN-TjN32sBkxsNqT2W5Jmb-B2nrTWkMpP0gp6CzpTW4NW7HT9l6N7yVVgv3G4qDRWGW1fK0yY70dJS1W7Xg8CK738t1lW3c2rWH1sS_sYN2p7VnYFJRyCW8WW1Y11W1_SpW2tBXPc647zGYW4l9_4L1Ph7KXW6tnn-Y6LFdbGN8BVSC39Xj2DW41Y3Zr5SzfzqW3j3NV_5-WcMBW8cCw9Q3WQPzMW7b85j83_1SbXW8y0lKP3djMg6W1nhrdJ358HscW3px6Jq3DLgGwW1HN-tb9f-V7RW3FSKLj6K9LHFW4vLfS5850RjcW40J-PW90tXDTW2c0W2H7DxTQ5VyH78B5dk77QW2P0J_29lpgjcN70nTh-GJ9MMf97h3dn04 ) , you’ll learn how to design an AI-powered workflow that automates form completion using event-driven workflows, RAG, and human-in-the-loop feedback.

Taught by Laurie Voss, VP of Developer Relations at LlamaIndex, this course will guide you through the fundamentals of event-driven AI—a powerful design pattern that enables agents to work asynchronously, handle complex decision-making, and perform tasks in parallel.

Enroll for Free
(https://info.deeplearning.ai/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJhC404/VXhDVq6L5f-mW4_ms5s90T7ltW3S9mTt5sPp46N74Pqvv3prCCW95jsWP6lZ3nNW6BZvXr4xN-TjN32sBkxsNqT2W5Jmb-B2nrTWkMpP0gp6CzpTW4NW7HT9l6N7yVVgv3G4qDRWGW1fK0yY70dJS1W7Xg8CK738t1lW3c2rWH1sS_sYN2p7VnYFJRyCW8WW1Y11W1_SpW2tBXPc647zGYW4l9_4L1Ph7KXW6tnn-Y6LFdbGN8BVSC39Xj2DW41Y3Zr5SzfzqW3j3NV_5-WcMBW8cCw9Q3WQPzMW7b85j83_1SbXW8y0lKP3djMg6W1nhrdJ358HscW3px6Jq3DLgGwW1HN-tb9f-V7RW3FSKLj6K9LHFW4vLfS5850RjcW40J-PW90tXDTW2c0W2H7DxTQ5VyH78B5dk77QW2P0J_29lpgjcN70nTh-GJ9MMf97h3dn04 )

Launch email GIFs (70) (https://info.deeplearning.ai/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJhC404/VXhDVq6L5f-mW4_ms5s90T7ltW3S9mTt5sPp46N74Pqvv3prCCW95jsWP6lZ3nNW6BZvXr4xN-TjN32sBkxsNqT2W5Jmb-B2nrTWkMpP0gp6CzpTW4NW7HT9l6N7yVVgv3G4qDRWGW1fK0yY70dJS1W7Xg8CK738t1lW3c2rWH1sS_sYN2p7VnYFJRyCW8WW1Y11W1_SpW2tBXPc647zGYW4l9_4L1Ph7KXW6tnn-Y6LFdbGN8BVSC39Xj2DW41Y3Zr5SzfzqW3j3NV_5-WcMBW8cCw9Q3WQPzMW7b85j83_1SbXW8y0lKP3djMg6W1nhrdJ358HscW3px6Jq3DLgGwW1HN-tb9f-V7RW3FSKLj6K9LHFW4vLfS5850RjcW40J-PW90tXDTW2c0W2H7DxTQ5VyH78B5dk77QW2P0J_29lpgjcN70nTh-GJ9MMf97h3dn04 )

By the end of this course, you’ll have built an agent that:

✔️ Extracts information from source documents using RAG

✔️ Parses forms to identify key fields and turn blank spaces into structured queries

✔️ Implements an event-driven architecture that supports branching, looping logic, and concurrent execution

✔️ Incorporates human-in-the-loop feedback, allowing users to refine responses using both text and voice commands

You'll gain hands-on experience working with LlamaIndex’s Workflows, learning how to structure an AI agent’s logic into steps that trigger events, emit outputs, and interact dynamically with users.

👉 Enroll Now
(https://info.deeplearning.ai/e3t/Ctc/LX+113/cJhC404/VXhDVq6L5f-mW4_ms5s90T7ltW3S9mTt5sPp46N74Pqvv3prCCW95jsWP6lZ3nNW6BZvXr4xN-TjN32sBkxsNqT2W5Jmb-B2nrTWkMpP0gp6CzpTW4NW7HT9l6N7yVVgv3G4qDRWGW1fK0yY70dJS1W7Xg8CK738t1lW3c2rWH1sS_sYN2p7VnYFJRyCW8WW1Y11W1_SpW2tBXPc647zGYW4l9_4L1Ph7KXW6tnn-Y6LFdbGN8BVSC39Xj2DW41Y3Zr5SzfzqW3j3NV_5-WcMBW8cCw9Q3WQPzMW7b85j83_1SbXW8y0lKP3djMg6W1nhrdJ358HscW3px6Jq3DLgGwW1HN-tb9f-V7RW3FSKLj6K9LHFW4vLfS5850RjcW40J-PW90tXDTW2c0W2H7DxTQ5VyH78B5dk77QW2P0J_29lpgjcN70nTh-GJ9MMf97h3dn04 )
